requirements.description: LR-approved partial joint penetration (PJP) welding required for hatch coaming to upper deck connection.

applied_measures.rule_basis: The connection between the hatch coaming and upper deck shall be made using LR-approved partial joint penetration (PJP) welding.

manual_review_flags: Fallback data – not extracted from scan. Requires manual verification against actual LR rules.
Thickness 40.0 mm <= 50 mm for yield 355 N/mm² – below Table 8.2.1 range. No measures required by table.
Using fallback rules_extraction – verify against actual LR rules scan.
